p:
Melting points were measured with a Stuart melting point apparatus and were uncorrected. Infra-red spectra were recorded on Schimadzu FT-IR 8400S spectrophotometer. The NMR spectra were recorded by Bruker spectrometer at 400 MHz. 13 C NMR spectra were run at 100 MHz in deuterated dimethylsulphoxide (DMSO d6). Elemental analyses were carried out at the Regional Centre for Microbiology and Biotechnology, Al-Azhar University, Cairo, Egypt. Unless otherwise noted, all solvents and reagents were commercially available and used without further purification. Compounds ( 2 and 3)
97 , ( 6a–h)
111–112 , ( 8–9)
113 , and ( 12 b)
114 were prepared according to the reported methods.
